an excellent homage to the classic boomer shooters of the 90s dusk provides all the glorious action packed brutality youd expect from a modern day retro style shooter while boasting a distinctly lovecraftian theme and blasting some epic guitar riffs during combat and then theres the fact that you can eat cans of hash like i did growing up in northern indiana and quaff some brewskies too if youre a fan of boomer shooters like me then this game is a must have

i understand the appeal of retrostyle games like dusk but even after several attempts i couldnt get into it i tend to prefer modern shooters like doom rather than shooting at pixelated graphics that said if you appreciate the oldschool aesthetic this game will likely be right up your alley

dusk absolutely became my favorite throwback fps game ever since the retro fps revival began in the late 2010s excellent level design and an exceptional arsenal earns this game a spot among the greats such as doom blood and duke nukem 3d secrets are very fun to find as well 1010
